SwagLabsLoginPage.description: This is the login page for Swag Labs, where users can enter their credentials to access the inventory page.

elements.name: Username Input
elements.description: Input field for the username.

elements.name: Password Input
elements.description: Input field for the password.

elements.name: Login Button
elements.description: Button to submit the login form.

elements.name: Accepted usernames
elements.description: Text displaying accepted usernames

elements.name: Password for all users
elements.description: Text displaying password for all users

SaucedemoInventoryPage.description: The inventory page displays a list of available products with their names, descriptions, prices, and 'Add to cart' buttons. It also includes a sorting dropdown to change the order of the products.

elements.name: Product Sort Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown to sort products by name or price.

elements.name: Product Sort Option: Name (A to Z)
elements.description: Option to sort products by name from A to Z.

elements.name: Product Sort Option: Name (Z to A)
elements.description: Option to sort products by name from Z to A.

elements.name: Product Sort Option: Price (low to high)
elements.description: Option to sort products by price from low to high.

elements.name: Product Sort Option: Price (high to low)
elements.description: Option to sort products by price from high to low.

elements.name: Sauce Labs Backpack Add to cart button
elements.description: Button to add the Sauce Labs Backpack to the cart.

elements.name: Sauce Labs Bike Light Add to cart button
elements.description: Button to add the Sauce Labs Bike Light to the cart.

elements.name: Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt Add to cart button
elements.description: Button to add the Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt to the cart.

elements.name: Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket Add to cart button
elements.description: Button to add the Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket to the cart.

elements.name: Sauce Labs Onesie Add to cart button
elements.description: Button to add the Sauce Labs Onesie to the cart.

elements.name: Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red) Add to cart button
elements.description: Button to add the Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red) to the cart.
